mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_news(news_number, admin_number, news_title, news_link_url, news_created_date, news_updated_date) VALUES (seq_news_items.nextval, #{adminNumber}, #{newsTitle}, #{newsLinkUrl}, TO_DATE(#{newsCreatedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{newsUpdatedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_news SET news_title = #{newsTitle}, news_link_url = #{newsLinkUrl}, news_created_date = TO_DATE(#{newsCreatedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), news_updated_date = TO_DATE(#{newsUpdatedDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') WHERE news_number = #{newsNumber}
